metrics.bio: CNN是美国主流新闻媒体，以全球新闻报道和突发新闻覆盖著称，立场偏向自由派，常被视为民主党支持者。

tweets.text: Zohran Mamdani will become New York City's next mayor, CNN projects, after a meteoric rise in Democratic politics. Follow live updates. https://t.co/D55BsmvA08 https://t.co/Lg9nL09N9b

Dick Cheney, the influential GOP vice president to George W. Bush and chief architect of the "war on terror," has died. He was 84.
https://t.co/BnVjNGVdft https://t.co/AT2oBJXV2d

Thailand launches airstrikes on Cambodia as Trump's peace agreement hangs in balance
https://t.co/V2NcwKHVPh
Three men have been arrested in connection with the deadly Hong Kong high-rise fire, police say. Hundreds of people remain missing. https://t.co/afcV0jrsYE https://t.co/JMEyyJ26U4
Democratic Rep. Jasmine Crockett launches a bid for US Senate in hopes of flipping the Texas seat currently held by Republican John Cornyn https://t.co/5kmx46lowU https://t.co/dcJN9e8Ap3
At least 36 people have died and 279 people are unaccounted for, officials say. Residents remain trapped on higher floors of the buildings. https://t.co/iclSJYO8p1 https://t.co/FtoFH3FyZ5

The FDA is finalizing plans to put a "black box" warning on Covid-19 vaccines, sources tell CNN, its most serious alert meant to warn about drug risks.
https://t.co/toYYb357fN
Bangladesh's ousted Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina has been sentenced to death after being found guilty of crimes against humanity https://t.co/YkYNGuk1PR

Accused DC pipe bomber told the FBI he believed the 2020 election was stolen, sources say.
https://t.co/6QifzJRuHL

California voters approve a measure to allow Democrats to redraw the state's congressional maps and potentially flip as many as five GOP-held House seats, CNN projects. Follow live updates. https://t.co/iLZF4TmAWj https://t.co/fPKxyfwBxf

The world has struck a new climate deal at the COP30 summit in Brazil, which calls for a tripling of funding to help countries adapt to increasingly severe climate impacts. But countries failed to agree to a roadmap away from fossil fuels, after entrenched divisions threatened to https://t.co/ZdKSxOs2Fs
